proof:
Proof. We can assume u, v, w are distinct since otherwise the inequality holds trivially. We assume that $d(v) \ge d(w)$ wlog.
$$
\begin{aligned}
x_{uv} + x_{uw} - x_{vw} & = \left(1 - \frac{|N_H(u) \cap N_H(v)|}{M_{uv}}\right) + \left(1 - \frac{|N_H(u) \cap N_H(w)|}{M_{uw}}\right) - \left(1 - \frac{|N_H(v) \cap N_H(w)|}{d(v)}\right) \\
& = 1 + \frac{|N_H(v) \cap N_H(w)|}{d(v)} - \frac{|N_H(u) \cap N_H(v)|}{M_{uv}} - \frac{|N_H(u) \cap N_H(w)|}{M_{uw}} \\
& \ge 1 + \frac{|N_H(v) \cap N_H(w)| - |N_H(u) \cap N_H(v)|}{M_{uv}} - \frac{|N_H(u) \cap N_H(w)|}{M_{uw}} \\
& = 1 - \frac{|(N_H(u) \setminus N_H(w)) \cap N_H(v)|}{M_{uv}} - \frac{|N_H(u) \cap N_H(w)|}{M_{uw}} \\
& \ge 1 - \frac{|N_H(u) \setminus N_H(w)|}{M_{uv}} - \frac{|N_H(u) \cap N_H(w)|}{M_{uw}} \\
& \ge 1 - \frac{|N_H(u) \setminus N_H(w)| + |N_H(u) \cap N_H(w)|}{d(u)} = 1 - \frac{|N_H(u)|}{d(u)} \ge 0.
\end{aligned}
$$
The first inequality used that $d(v) \le M_{uv}$, the equality on the fourth line follows from the general set identity $|A \cap C| - |B \cap C| = |(A \setminus B) \cap C|$, and the final inequalities used that $d(u) \le M_{uv}$ and $d(u) \le M_{uw}$.
